borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
The proposed development, by reason of scale, siting, design and massing, would result in an undue loss of outlook and overbearing impact to the rear gardens of neighbouring dwellings. The proposal therefore fails to adequately protect the amenity of neighbouring occupiers, causing unacceptable harm to this. As such, the proposal is found to be at odds with the following policies which seek to ensure that residential amenity is sufficiently protected: 
 National Planning Policy Framework
     (NPPF) (DLUHC, 2023)
 Policy D6 of the London Plan (March 2021)
 Policies BP8 and BP11 of the Local Development
     Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)
 Residential Extensions and
     Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)
 Policies DMD1 and DMD6 of The London Borough of Barking
     and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version,
     December 2021)
The proposed development, by reason of siting, scale, design and massing, would be an undesirable addition which would appear overly dominant and at odds with the surrounding pattern of development. It therefore would fail to respect or reflect the character and appearance of the host dwelling and surrounding area, causing harm to each of these. This is at odds with the following policies, which seek to ensure that development is sympathetic to the local character:
 National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (DLUHC, 2023)
 Policies D1 and D4 of
     the London Plan (March 2021)
 Policies
     CP2 and CP3 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy
     (July 2010)
 Policies BP8
     and BP11 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide
     Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)
 Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary
     Planning Document (February 2012)
 Policies
     SP2 and DMD6 of The London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft
     Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)
description: Construction of an outbuilding to provide habitable accommodation ancillary to the main dwellinghouse.
